info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:05PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central McDowell, northwestern Alexander, eastern Mitchell, Caldwell, Avery and Burke Counties through 600 PM EST... At 505 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Sugar Grove to near Newland to 3 miles northeast of Spruce Pine. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lenoir, Morganton, Marion, Spruce Pine, Newland, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Valdese, Gamewell and Hudson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
